name: Chat Bubble
description: Automate customer support with a ChatGPT Bot trained on your data

features.name: Just paste your website url
features.description:
We automatically get your website pages.
Other data sources are available too 
(e.g. PDF, Gdoc, Sheets, Notion, Airtable, etc...)

features.name: Training
features.description: After collecting your data, we process it and train your bot. Don’t worry, it’s fast ⚡️

features.name: Copy/Paste the HTML snippet
features.description:
The final step is to the widget on your website. 
Just add the generated HTML code to your website

features.name: Auto Synch
features.description:
We keep the bot up to date with your data. 
We automatically synch your data when possible.
 You can also setup a webhook or manually trigger a synch.
